features/analytics.title: Asset Management
features/analytics.description: The Asset Management section of SiteReports provides powerful tools to help you track equipment throughout the AV installation process.

features/assets.title: Asset Management
features/assets.description: The Asset Management module in SiteReports provides powerful tools to help you track equipment throughout the AV installation process.

features/dashboard.title: Dashboard
features/dashboard.description: The SiteReports dashboard is your command center for managing all your AV installation projects.

features/folders.title: Folder Management
features/folders.description: The Folder Manager is a central organizational system that helps you structure and manage all aspects of your AV installation projects.

features/reports.title: Project Management
features/reports.description: Project management is at the core of the SiteReports platform. This section explains how to effectively manage your AV installation projects.

guides/asset-reporting.title: Asset Reporting Guide
guides/asset-reporting.description: Learn how to create comprehensive asset reports for tracking, documentation, and client deliverables.

guides/asset-workflow.title: Asset Tracking Workflow
guides/asset-workflow.description: Learn the complete workflow for tracking assets from initial inspection through installation and testing.

guides/create-project.title: Project Creation Guide
guides/create-project.description: Learn how to set up new AV installation projects in SiteReports effectively.

guides/create-report.title: How to Create a Project
guides/create-report.description: This guide walks you through the process of creating a new AV installation project in SiteReports.

guides/custom-reports.title: Custom Reports Guide
guides/custom-reports.description: Learn how to create and manage custom reports for your AV installation projects.

guides/custom-templates.title: Custom Templates Guide
guides/custom-templates.description: Learn how to create and manage templates for projects, reports, and workflows in SiteReports.

guides/data-visualization.title: Data Visualization Guide
guides/data-visualization.description: Learn how to create and use visual representations of your project data for better insights and reporting.

guides/export-data.title: Export Data Guide
guides/export-data.description: Learn how to export and manage data from your AV installation projects in various formats.

guides/qr-codes.title: QR Code Best Practices
guides/qr-codes.description: Learn how to effectively use QR codes in your AV installation projects for efficient asset tracking and management.

guides/share-report.title: How to Manage Tasks
guides/share-report.description: This guide explains how to effectively create, assign, and track tasks in your AV installation projects.

guides/system-integration.title: System Integration Guide
guides/system-integration.description: Learn how to integrate SiteReports with other tools and systems in your AV installation workflow.

guides/task-management.title: Task Management Guide
guides/task-management.description: Learn how to effectively create, assign, and track tasks throughout your AV installation projects.

guides/team-access.title: Team Access Guide
guides/team-access.description: Learn how to manage team members, roles, and permissions in your AV installation projects.

intro.title: Introduction to SiteReports
intro.description: Welcome to the SiteReports documentation! This guide will help you get the most out of our professional AV site reporting platform.

quickstart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickstart.description: This guide will help you get started with SiteReports quickly. Follow these steps to create your first project and start managing your AV installation.

reference/api.title: API Reference
reference/api.description: SiteReports offers a comprehensive API that allows you to integrate our reporting capabilities into your own applications and workflows.
